text: If we allow this law, society will collapse.
label: slippery_slope

text: If we let students use AI for one essay, eventually they'll stop learning how to think and the entire education system will vanish.
label: slippery_slope

text: First they'll tax soda, then they'll tax sugar, and before you know it, the government will be weighing you every morning.
label: slippery_slope

text: If we change the dress code, people will start showing up in pajamas, and then total workplace anarchy will follow.
label: slippery_slope

text: If you give an inch to the protesters, they’ll take a mile and eventually occupy the entire city permanently.
label: slippery_slope

text: If we let them change the name of this street, they’ll eventually rename the whole city and erase our history.
label: slippery_slope

text: If you let your kid stay up late once, they’ll never sleep again and eventually drop out of school.
label: slippery_slope

text: First it’s a tax on carbon, next thing you know they’ll be charging us for the air we breathe.

text: If we legalize this drug, everyone will become an addict and the workforce will disappear.

text: If you give her a promotion now, everyone will expect one, and the company will go bankrupt in a month.
